channel.title: How do i get the game started?
channel.description:
Now i've downloaded 10 different servers and one of them worked (and it wasn't a good one). I do not know what i'm doing wrong, could someone just brief me on the steps i have to take. Most of them have two differnet downloads which is really confusing because i do not know what i have to do with them when they are seperate (i don't no what to do when they are not seperate either lol, but its even more confusing when they are seperate). When i click the run server thing in the file it just opens a black box that says Run (name of server) online! Then nothing else happens. I have no clue what to do to get a game going.
Any help, advice, tips, tutorials, guides, or instructions would be greatly appreciated :D.

item.title: How do i get the game started?
item.dc:creator: @The_rogue_user The rogue user
item.description:
@The_rogue_user wrote:

Ok, now i’m a lot less sonfused, thanks!
